title: By the King, a proclamation for prising of wines
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall the seventeenth day of January, 1676/7. in the eight and twentieth year of our reign."
Imperfect: folded, with very slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
